name: Breakfast Food Maker! Kids Girl Chef Cooking Game
name_original: Breakfast Food Maker! Kids Girl Chef Cooking Game
description:
Good morning everyone! Let’s start the beautiful day with yummy breakfast!
Come with me to my home kitchen and I will teach you how to make fried eggs, omelette, juice, fried bacon & hams and my favorite corn flakes!
Which food do you want to try first?
Come on! Let’s get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy breakfast for fried eggs, omelette, juice, fried bacon & hams and corn flakes
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: egg molds, pan, cooking range, plates, frying tong, bowls, egg blender, spatula, fork, measuring cup, sieve, spoon, knife, cutting board, food processor, straws and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: butter, eggs, salt, black pepper, bacon, hams, olive oil, veggies, fruits, meats, side dishes, water, corn meal, sugar, milk and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Try different tools to make your breakfast
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful straws, side dishes and drinks

DOWNLOAD TODAY!
Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Maker-Lab/674940652601869
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/The_MAKER_LAB
